1.title: The New Movie Show - "The Fate of the Furious" & "Gifted"
1.plot: The Movie Guys are back with a brand new style of comedy show, all about the week in new movies. This week Paul heads up his team of Karen, Adam and Bart to take fresh looks at "The Fate of the Furious" and "Gifted". SEGMENTS: The Fate of the Furious Movie Preview, Gifted Movie Preview, Car Mechanic for the stars Tom Cranks looks at the nuts and bolts of stunt cars, Dr. Simpson Bruckheimer talks about how the "Fast and Furious" movies have gone so over the top, they've re-established where the top is and another round of "What's Vin Diesel Saying?".

2.title: The New Movie Show - "Unforgettable", "Free Fire" & "Born in China"
2.plot: The New Movie Show gives you everything you need to know about all the new movies opening Friday, April 21st, 2017. SEGMENTS: What Is A Movie Guy?, Unforgettable Movie Preview - sponsored by The Psycho Girlfriend Dating App, Free Fire Movie Preview - and help understanding the difference between a Mexican Standoff and a French one, Still In Theaters (Still?), Born In China Movie Preview and Time permitting: Pisghetti.

3.title: The New Movie Show - "The Circle", "Sleight" & "How to be a Latin Lover"
3.plot: The New Movie Show gives you everything you need to know about all the new movies opening Friday, April 28th, 2017. SEGMENTS: - The Circle Movie Preview, Sleight Movie Preview, How To Be A Latin Lover Movie Preview, The Learning Chalet Educational Tape Series Teaches You How To Seduce Women Using Latin. Also, Pisghetti.

4.title: The New Movie Show - "Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2"
4.plot: The New Movie Show gives you everything you need to know about all the new movies opening Friday, May 5th, 2017. SEGMENTS: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Movie Preview, Does ANY '70s song work in Guardians of the Galaxy?, The Indie Report is Interrupted for more news on Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2, and again. And again. 5 Things You Totally Knew About Guardians of The Galaxy, Could Kevin Feige get ANYTHING greenlit?, To and From Report: Colossal.

5.title: The New Movie Show - "Snatched" & "King Arthur: Legend of the Sword"
5.plot: The New Movie Show gives you everything you need to know about all the new movies opening Friday, May 12th, 2017. SEGMENTS: Snatched Movie Preview, King Arthur: Legend of the Sword Movie Preview, Bart gets abducted, Donald Trump calls in, King Arthur Soundtrack Breakdown with Adam.

6.title: The New Movie Show - "Alien: Covenant", "Everything Everything" & more
6.plot: The New Movie Show gives you everything you need to know about all the new movies opening Friday, May 19th, 2017. SEGMENTS: Alien: Covenant Movie Preview, Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul "Dear Diary" Movie Preview, Everything Everything Movie Preview, Karen's Birthdays.

7.title: The New Movie Show - "Pirates of the Caribbean" & "Baywatch"
7.plot: The New Movie Show gives you everything you need to know about all the new movies opening Friday, May 26th, 2017. SEGMENTS: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales Movie Preview, Baywatch Movie Preview, Adam's Baywatch rant, Interview with Michael McNutt of NovaCon.

8.title: The New Movie Show - "Wonder Woman" & "Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie"
8.plot: The New Movie Show gives you everything you need to know about all the new movies opening Friday, June 2, 2017. SEGMENTS: Wonder Woman movie preview, Captain Underpants movie preview, Wonder Woman dating profile advice, live on the ground at WonderCon.

imdb.title: The New Movie Show
plot: A brand new style of entertainment show, all about the week in new movies featuring comedy troupe The Movie Guys.
